entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:32 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 08:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -13.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
